title: Can't loggin again after update
body:
Hello!

Second update second time with the same error
[error](http://imgur.com/a/rrqpQ)

Can't login.

replies.body:
I can now, thanks anyway!

Can it be a coincidence that after all the updates now i always have that error for a couple of minutes and then everything is perfect again?

It could be an unstable connection, meaning that it might go out again at any moment.  I'm glad it's working now, but I still recommend going over that guide just to make sure your network is tightened up!

Thanks for the screenshot!  It looks like your network is able to reach our authentication server, so it can't grab your credentials.  My suggestion would be to use the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to troubleshoot and get into the client.  Let me know if you have any questions.
